WorkItem.Description:
Blizzard announced that as season 10 starts (today/tomorrow for US/EU), the 371 Vicious items that seemed unused will become buyable with Honor, replacing the s9 365 set.
They should be added to Rawr (esp. because they might well be better than the 359 items for some specs, and thus be BiS among non-locked-out items).

Comments.Message: Yea I didn't realize that....I'll get this updated for next patch. Damn the PTR not having this info until the last second.
I don't see this on live.

At least for alliance, it starts on page 4 from Knight-Lieutenant T'Malre Sydes. These are not the "2200 Arena Rating" items from the previous season though. They just updated the stats from the old gear.
